name: CHARGED: RC Racing - Starter Edition
description:
CHARGED: RC Racing Starter Edition gives you access to the first 3 singleplayer championships including 12 unlockable tracks and 11 unlockable RC-Cars.
The Starter Edition also gives you access to the multiplayer mode of the game.
Your Starter Edition progress will be available when switchting to the full version of CHARGED: RC Racing.

They may be small... but they are FAST!

In CHARGED: RC Racing Starter Edition you get in control of an RC Car and race against 1-4 opponents.
You will have to make use of different items to strike down your opponents and win all championships by placing first position in each race.
Each championship your cars will become faster and faster!

CHARGED: RC Racing - Starter Edition content:

Singleplayer Career

Race through 3 championships by placing P.1 in each race. Earn money to buy new cars and earn XP to level up and unlock new championships. Each championship has its own regulations and makes the races more difficult.

Cars

Unlock 11 RC-Cars by earning money in championships. Customizing is only available in the full version of CHARGED: RC Racing.

Tracks

Race on 10 different racetracks. Master each track and maintain speed without flipping the car. You can race through a mall, suburbia, shrunken worlds, RC tracks and more.

RC-Pass

The CHARGED RC-Pass is available in the full version of CHARGED: RC Racing.

Multiplayer

Challenge your friends or random people around the world and show them your creation. Use our new Discord channel to connect with people playing this game.

Items

Using items is the key to success in CHARGED: RC Racing. Use 8 different items or keep the items tactical to secure your first position.

CHARGED: RC Racing - Starter Edition content summary:

  • 3 singleplayer championships (3 of 9 championships available)
  • multiplayer access
  • 12 tracks
  • 11 RC-Cars
  • 3 different AI difficulties

CHARGED: RC Racing - full version content summary:

  • 6 singleplayer championships
  • 3 bonus singleplayer mini championships
  • multiplayer access
  • 21 tracks
  • 38 RC-Cars
  • RC Car Customizing
  • 18 achievements
  • CHARGED RC PASS with 20 levels
  • 3 different AI difficulties
